Description.Name: Arcade
Description.Details: That empty storage space in Gamma Pod, with some additional power conduits, could easily support some VR based gaming and a big screens for Solaris tournaments. The Arcade adds +2 to Crew Morale.

AssignedCastDescription: There's this game, Commander. No, hear me out, I'm serious! It's called Battletech, and you pilot a Leopard in a bunch of battle scenarios. Now, I'm not saying this game will make me a better pilot. But I'm not saying it won't, either.
